item.title: Java runtime error
item.dc:creator: @Jazzelhawk Jazzelhawk
item.description:
@Jazzelhawk wrote:

I get this runtime error:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at net.com.codeusa.model.games.DiceGame.rollDice(DiceGame.java:59) at net.com.codeusa.model.games.DiceGame.game(DiceGame.java:68) at net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java :998) at net.com.codeusa.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:168) at net.com.codeusa.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:92) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:192) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
This is the method rollDice:

public void rollDice() { die[0] = randomRoll(); die[1] = randomRoll(); die[2] = randomRoll(); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have rolled a "+die[0]+", a "+die[1]+", and a "+die[2]+"."); }
Line 59 is “die[2] = randomRoll();”.

and then in the method “game” line 68 is just running the method “rollDice”.

This is the command:

if (cmd[0].equals("diceme")){ int amountToDice = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); if (amountToDice > pi.invItemCount(p, 995)){ p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You dont have enough money to bet that much!"); }else{ p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You roll the dice"); p.getDice().game(amountToDice); } }
Can someone please help me with this and tell me what is wrong?
